https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zjhVHDCCl2nwR1yCPZX4xw819Se.jpg A faithful Jehovah's Witness is forced to shun her own sister because of a religious transgression. As the separation draws out, she starts to question the meaning of God's love. Apostasy
